DOC.brief_summary: To compare effectiveness in reducing triglycerides between daily plasma exchange and glucose+insulin infusion in patients with non-severe acute hypertriglyceridemic pancreatitis with mildly elevated triglycerides
DOC.brief_title: Plasma Exchange vs Conservative Management in Non-severe Acute Hypertriglyceridemic Pancreatitis
DOC.criteria: mild acute hypertriglyceridemic pancreatitis triglycerides >15 but < 40 mmol/l pregnancy severe course of pancreatitis
